name: MENA Wellness Corp
description: Operator of a leading Arabic-first digital platform intended to improve wellness, health, and productivity. The company's platform provides a wellness program based on an easy-to-follow points system and offers a healthy diet plan without depriving them of traditional Arab dishes, enabling users to find a path to wellness and healthy living without giving up the foods they love and making changes in their lifestyle.
one_liner: Operator of a leading Arabic-first digital platform intended to improve wellness, health, and productivity. The company's platform provides a wellness program based on an easy-to-follow points system and offers a healthy diet plan without depriving them of traditional Arab dishes, enabling users to find a path to wellness and healthy living without giving up the foods they love and making changes in their lifestyle.
